subject: Re: Afeter a long discussion...
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Frank.... PLEASE stay and continue doing what you do.  You and your 
work are the reason I became interested in this subject.  Please 
reconsider after some time to relax and think about it.
People respect you and enjoy your company and words of wisdom. It is 
Frank Sumption and Frank's Boxes that are the ones known around the 
world.
PLEASE remain here with us, and continue to participate and work on 
your fantastic projects!!!

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  After a long discussion, and at times a yelling match with Chris 
Moon on the phone...I have like zero memory for verbal stuff, 
basically I think it came down to he said-she said type deal. I could 
agree with some of what Mr Moon said, but the bottom line is--I don't 
care! I have had enough of these endless pissing contests, one person 
telling me one thing, someone else telling me something else. I'm not 
wise enough to tell who is telling the truth. I'm done, I'm not 
discussing this stuff anymore, I'm not making boxes anymore. I have 
absolutely no interest in the so called paranormal. I don't sell this 
shit, I don't make any money, all it does eat all my time and piss me 
off. I'll finish this last box I'm working on, and that's it. No more 
e-mails, no more discussion--I have had it!
>  
>  Mr Moon said he would be glad to come on the group and answer 
question--so there ya go, now is your chance. I'm not going to be the 
go between, nor will I participate. 
>  
>  Frank-S
> _________________________________________________________________
> Don't get caught with egg on your face. Play Chicktionary!
> http://club.live.com/chicktionary.aspx?icid=chick_wlhmtextlink1_dec
>
